name: Dark Wikipedia
description:
Simple Gray Wikipedia theme. (It based on style 4325.)
It works on New Wikipedia and fixed issues of the original.
additional_info:
[Change Log] 2012/07/31
  • Fixed the missing logo.
  • Removed extra bullets on Search results.
2012/05/02
  • Removed extra border of the search box.
  • Changed background color of math expressions and images to white.
  • Changed color of some borders and icons to gray.
2011/01/31
  • Fixed issues on Personal Preferences and Search Result.
